name: Sunnah.com - Hadith Database
description: Comprehensive hadith collection with authenticated narrations from major hadith books including Sahih Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, Sunan Abu Dawud, Jami at-Tirmidhi, and more. Contains Arabic text with English translations and grading information.

extraction.contentNotes: Hadith pages contain: narrator chain, Arabic text, English translation, reference number, and authentication grade. The grade is crucial for determining reliability.

rendering.notes: Sunnah.com works well with standard fetch - no JavaScript rendering needed

aiNotes: When citing hadith, always include: 1) Collection name, 2) Hadith number, 3) Grade if available. Format: [Collection] [Number] - [Grade]. Example: 'Sahih al-Bukhari 1 - Sahih'. Direct URL format: sunnah.com/bukhari:1
